imdb.title: Sangatsu no Lion
imdb.plot: A 17 year old socially awkward orphaned shogi player, dealing with adult problems like financial difficulties, loneliness, and depression.

episodes.title: Setting Sun/Ramune
episodes.plot: Rei's first day as a member of the Shogi Science Club.

episodes.title: Chaos/Kumakura
episodes.plot: Rei watches a title match between Souya and Kumakura while thinking about Gotou's actions.

episodes.title: June/Ladybug Bush: Part 1
episodes.plot: Rei remembers his past and how he became a professional shogi player. Akari realizes there is something wrong with Hina.

episodes.title: Ladybug Bush (Parts 2 & 3)/Feelings
episodes.plot: Rei has to make an important decision after hearing Hina's history about the bullying in her school and her friend Chiho.

episodes.title: Feelings/Confession
episodes.plot: Rei is having a hard time in coming up with a plan to help Hina, so he asks his teacher for advice. Akari questions her actions towards Hina.

episodes.title: Small World/Letter
episodes.plot: Rei asks a friend from Hina's school to keep her company during lunch break without realizing all the consequences of his decision.

episodes.title: Start of the Rainy Season/Hachiya
episodes.plot: Hina's situation keeps getting worse. Rei has to face a very annoying opponent in the first round of the Newcomer King Tournament.

episodes.title: Midday Moon/Adventurers
episodes.plot: Rei realizes how wrong his plan for helping Hina was after talking with his teacher. Shimada tells Rei how he met Nikaidou and the true about his condition.

episodes.title: Kingdom
episodes.plot: While Hina is at her school trip, Rei has to play his most important shogi match yet in the Newcomer King Tournament final match.

episodes.title: Silver Wings/River Scenery
episodes.plot: Junkei Yamazaki tells his story. The Kawamoto family and Rei go to celebrate Rei's victory in the Newcomer King Tournament.

episodes.title: Where the Sun Shines/Small World
episodes.plot: Rei celebrates his victory with the Shogi Science Club. Shimada faces Sakurai in a shogi match for the right to become the challenger of the Kishuo Championship.

episodes.title: Black Mist/Light
episodes.plot: The bullying case in Hina's school takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: Small Palm/Sunny Place
episodes.plot: The bullying case in Hina's school is finally coming to an end. Hina receives an unexpected letter. Rei makes another promise.

episodes.title: Flowing Away/White Storm: Part 1
episodes.plot: With the conclusion of all the previous events, Rei is finally going to face Meijin Souya in a commemorative match. Does he stand a chance against the best shogi player?

episodes.title: White Storm (Parts 2-4)
episodes.plot: After the match, with all the bullet train services suspended because of a typhoon, Rei and Souya are forced to find a place to stay. Rei finds out the true behind the calm personality of Souya.

episodes.title: White Storm: Part 5/Restart
episodes.plot: Rei can't stop thinking about his match with Souya. An old friend returns.

episodes.title: Burnt Field (Parts 1-2)
episodes.plot: The title match for the Kishou Championship between Shimada and Yanagihara finally begins. Will Shimada win his first title or will Yanagihara retain the title once again?

episodes.title: Burnt Field (Parts 3-4)
episodes.plot: Shimada is getting the upper hand but Yanagihara is not giving up. Who will come up on top?

episodes.title: Being Here/Summer Vacation: Part 1
episodes.plot: Hina goes to visit Chiho. Hina starts to think about her future. The head teacher finally has an answer for Takagi's question.

episodes.title: Summer Vacation: Part 2/New Year
episodes.plot: After much thinking, Hina decides to which high school she wants to go. Rei helps Hina to study for the entrance exam.

episodes.title: Passing Time/Spring Comes
episodes.plot: Just days before the entrance exam, Hina finds out that a very important person for her is going to leave March Town.

episodes.title: The Other House/Child of March Town
episodes.plot: Rei visits his old home. Hina prepares for her first day as a high school student.

episodes.title: Chapter 1: Kiriyama Rei/Chapter 2: Kawazoi no machi
episodes.plot: Meet Rei Kiriyama, a 17 year old professional shogi player that suffers from depression and doesn't know how to deal with his personal relationships.

episodes.title: Chapter 2: Kawazoi no machi/Chapter 3: Akari/Chapter 4: Hashi no mukô
episodes.plot: Rei returns home were he finds his self proclaim friend Nikaidou. The next day, Rei has a shogi match and remembers the day he met the Kawamoto sisters for the first time.

episodes.title: Chapter 5: Harunobu/Chapter 6: Yozora no mukô
episodes.plot: Rei has a shogi match against Nikaidou and remembers the first match he had against him. After the match, he goes to visit the Kawamoto sisters.

episodes.title: Chapter 7: Hina/Chapter 8: Buiesu
episodes.plot: Hina wants to cook a homemade lunch for a boy from her school. Rei and Nikaidou look for a place to eat but find the Kawamoto sisters instead.

episodes.title: Chapter 9: Keiyaku/Chapter 10: Kakkô no su no uede
episodes.plot: Rei must pick up Momo from kindergarten. Nothing can go wrong with doing this errand, right? Unfortunately, this leads Rei to remember more of his past.

episodes.title: Chapter 11: Kami-sama no kodomo 1/Chapter 12: Kami-sama no kodomo 2
episodes.plot: Rei remembers the beginning of his shogi profesional career and how hard it has been for him to continue this lifestyle. He later meets Hina and invites her a drink.

episodes.title: Chapter 13: Kami-sama no kodomo 3 (shôzen)/Chapter 14: Taisetsu na mono. Taisetsu na koto./Chapter 15: Shôgi oshiete
episodes.plot: Rei has a talk with Takahashi. They both meet again in the Kawamoto's family home where they watch a shogi match featuring Rei. Hina asks Rei to teach her how to play shogi.

episodes.title: Chapter 15: Shôgi oshiete (shôzen)/Chapter 16: Omokage/Chapter 17: Enrai 1
episodes.plot: Rei and Nikaidou teach both Hina and Momo how to play shogi. When Rei returns home, he finds someone from his past waiting for him.

episodes.title: Chapter 18: Enrai 2/Chapter 19: Enrai 3
episodes.plot: Rei has a shogi match with an old man called Matsunaga. After the match, they both go to have lunch.

episodes.title: Chapter 20: Okura reta mono 1/Chapter 21: Okura reta mono 2
episodes.plot: Rei has another unpleasant conversation with Kyouko. On Christmas Eve, Rei has a shogi match that makes him question himself about his decisions.

episodes.title: Chapter 22: Yuku toshi/Chapter 23: Kuru toshi
episodes.plot: Rei catches a cold and stays in his apartment for days. On New Year's Eve, the Kawamoto sisters go to Rei's apartment and force him to go to their house to take care of him.

episodes.title: Omnibus Special
episodes.plot: Akari, Hinata, and Momo pay Rei a visit on New Year's Eve when he's left bedridden from a cold he's had since Christmas. The Kawamoto sisters forcibly take him to the doctor and then back to their home.

episodes.title: Chapter 24: Taigan ni aru mono/ Chapter 25: Kuroi kawa 1
episodes.plot: Rei is back at home but it seems like he is missing the Kawamoto's family home. Rei has a shogi match in the Lion King Tournament against an unique opponent.

episodes.title: Chapter 26: Kuroi kawa 2/Chapter 27: Tobira no mukô
episodes.plot: Misumi has his shogi match with Gotou. Rei finally has his match against Shimada after preparing himself for this match and his possible match against Gotou.

episodes.title: Blinding Darkness/Just a Little Water
episodes.plot: Rei realizes that he completely underestimated Shimada, so he starts to sink deep into desperation.

episodes.title: Moonlight/Lump of Ego
episodes.plot: The finals of the Lion King Tournament between Shimada and Gotou has finally began.

episodes.title: Running Through the Night/Middle of the Slope
episodes.plot: After finishing some work at school, Rei goes to see the last match between Gotou and Shimada. After the match, Rei asks Shimada an important question.

episodes.title: Silver Thread/Water's Surface/Base of the Blue Nigh
episodes.plot: Rei and Nikaidou accompany Shimada in his first title match of the Lion King Tournament against Souya Meijin. After the match, Rei meets with Kyouko once again.

episodes.title: Torrent/Passing TIme
episodes.plot: After the last workshop, Shimada invites Rei to his house to practice shogi before Shimada's last match against Souya.

episodes.title: Passing the Night/Kyoto: Part 1
episodes.plot: Shimada tells the story of how he became a shogi player. The next day, he travels with Rei to Kyoto for his final match with Souya.

episodes.title: Kyoto: Parts 2 & 3
episodes.plot: Shimada has a dream in the morning before continuing his match with Souya. He is doing the best he can, but Souya keeps getting the upper hand. Will he be able to bet Souya at least once?

episodes.title: When the Cherry Blossoms Bloom/Small Murmur
episodes.plot: Rei, Nikaidou and Shimada travel to Shimada's village for a shogi event. Shimada has to come to terms with his defeat.

episodes.title: New School Term/Fighter
episodes.plot: A new school term begins. Rei and his teacher decide to create a shogi club.
